snippet: Prosecutors in Lille have dropped a sexual assault investigation into Dominique Strauss-Kahn after a Belgian escort recanted her original account about a brutal encounter.
abstract: Prosecutors in Lille, France, drop a sexual assault investigation into Dominique Strauss-Kahn after Belgian escort recants her original account about a brutal encounter; Strauss-Kahn still faces a criminal charge of participating in an organized prostitution ring.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in Lille have dropped a sexual assault investigation into Dominique Strauss-Kahn after a Belgian escort recanted her original account about a brutal encounter.
